src:
Investasi Anjlok Goyang Ekonomi RI Kuartal III-2019
05 Nov 2019, 05:26 by Danang Sugianto


Foto: detik

Jakarta - Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS) mencatat nilai investasi atau Pembentukan Modal Tetap Bruto (PMTB) di kuartal III-2019 hanya tumbuh 4,21%. Angka ini jauh lebih rendah dibanding kuartal III/2018 perlambatan agak dalam karena secara (yoy) tercatat 6,96%. Kepala BPS Kecuk Suhariyanto mengatakan beberapa yang tumbuh melambat adalah PMTB bangunan sebesar 5,03% dari kuartal sebelumnya 5,46%. Hal ini jadi salah satu yang memengaruhi pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia kuartal III-2019."Investasi atau PMTB melambat tumbuh 4,21%. kalau dibandingkan tw 3 2018 perlambatannya agak dalam sebelumnya 6,92%" kata Suhariyanto di kantor BPS, Jakarta, Selasa (5/11/2019).Selain itu, kata Suhariyanto, konsumsi pemerintah juga tercatat tumbuh melambat 0,98% (yoy). Perlambatan ini disebabkan oleh penurunan belanja barang dan belanja jasa. Konsumsi lembaga nonprofit juga tumbuh melambat seiring berakhirnya Pemilu dan Pilkada hanya tumbuh 7,44% dari kuartal III/2018 sebesar 8,58% (yoy).Untuk ekspor, tercatat kontraksi pada kuartal III/2019 menjadi 0,02% dari tahun lalu periode yang sama 0,08% (yoy). Sementara itu untuk impor, tercatat kontraksi terdalam dengan nilai pertumbuhan -8,61% dibandingkan dengan kuartal yang sama periode 2018 tercatat 14,02% (yoy).Simak Video "Sandi: Pemerintah Terjebak Dalam Pertumbuhan Ekonomi 5%"[Gambas:Video 20detik](fdl/fdl)
text:
Investment Falls in the Rocking Economy of the Republic of Indonesia Quarter III-2019
05 Nov 2019, 05:26 by Danang Sugianto


Photo: seconds

Jakarta - The Central Statistics Agency (BPS) recorded the value of investment or Gross Fixed Capital Formation (PMTB) in the third quarter of 2019 only grew 4.21%. This figure is much lower compared to the third quarter / 2018 slowing down somewhat because (yoy) recorded 6.96%. BPS Head Kecuk Suhariyanto said that some of the slowing growths were building PMTB of 5.03% from the previous quarter 5.46%. This is one of the factors that affect Indonesia's economic growth in the third quarter of 2019. "Investment or PMTB slowed to a growth of 4.21%. Compared to Q3 2018, the slowdown was somewhat in the previous 6.92%," Suhariyanto said at the BPS office, Jakarta, Tuesday (Tuesday) 5/11/2019) In addition, Suhariyanto said, government consumption was also recorded to have slowed down 0.98% (yoy). This slowdown was caused by a decrease in goods and services expenditure. Consumption of non-profit institutions also grew slowly as the end of the General Election and the local elections grew by only 7.44% from the quarter III / 2018 of 8.58% (yoy). For exports, the contraction recorded in the third quarter / 2019 to 0.02% from last year's period which is the same 0.08% (yoy). Meanwhile for imports, the deepest contraction was recorded with a growth value of -8.61% compared to the same quarter of the 2018 period recorded 14.02% (yoy). Watch Video "Password: The Government Is Stuck In 5% Economic Growth" [Gambas: Video 20sec ] (fdl / fdl)
